W

Window - Class in org.klotski.graphics
This is the main Graphical Class that connect all the Coding Classes with all the Graphics Classes.
It does not access and calls methods from other Graphics or Coding.
It extends JFrame to set Frame parameters and implements various Listeners.
Thanks to them, Window is able to call Controllers handling the Events.
It only instantiates every object and calls every controller in the right situation, handling various Listeners.
It is important to make Window it visible,
after it becomes instantiated, and to save the game with the right command.
For example:
Window(String) - Constructor for class org.klotski.graphics.Window
This is the only constructor for a Window object.
It sets the initial params and instantiates many objects.
It calls many starting functions to divide the work.
windowActivated(WindowEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.coding.Klotski
Forced implementation of WindowListener.windowActivated(WindowEvent) function.
It is useless in this case, so it is void.

Implementation of WindowListener.windowActivated(WindowEvent) function.
It is useless in this case, so it is void.

It is useless in this case, so it is void.
windowClosed(WindowEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.coding.Klotski
Override of WindowListener.windowClosed(WindowEvent) function.
Watches window boolean values to exit the game or reOpen Login Page
windowClosed(WindowEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.LoginPage
Implementation of WindowListener.windowClosed(WindowEvent) function.
It is useless in this case, so it is void.
windowClosed(WindowEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Override of WindowListener.windowClosing(WindowEvent) function.
Stops the timer when the window is closed

windowClosing(WindowEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.LoginPage
Checks if the window exit button is clicked to exit the program.
windowClosing(WindowEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Override of WindowListener.windowClosing(WindowEvent) function.
Calls the QuitController to confirm closing
